scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Virgin Mary seated on a bed, holding the Christ Child. She wears a blue robe and a crown, with a halo behind her head. To the left, a woman in a red gown and an elaborate headdress kneels in prayer. The background features a richly patterned red tapestry and architectural elements suggesting an interior space, with arches and columns visible. The overall scene conveys a devotional moment of prayer and veneration.
